__e: Men at some time are masters of their fates.
There's nothin, like running your own business.
Well, we're none of us masters of our own fates at the moment, I'm afraid.
The party is only as good as its host and the host is only as good as your cake.
Mike would be happy to know that today, the cops are going after the landlords.

- Miss, we owned this house for 300 years now but its no longer our home since September 23rd.

Unless you want to tell your masters that your biggest security leak is your own little brother.
These are cold-blooded eugenicists. These are cold-blooded people who think they're God, think that they're our masters, that think that we're animals.
- You mean "owners." - that's what I said.
Cos if there's one thing I know, it's that none of us will be free until we stop thinking of ourselves as victims and become masters... - and mistresses - of our own lives and our own futures.

Not every human is as kind as ours.

We're looking for drifters. People with nowhere to be, just breezing' through their lives, nothin' on their minds.
